methods.name: poll
methods.description: Checks scroll position and loads more content if necessary
methods.description_zh: 检查滚动位置并在必要时加载更多内容

methods.name: trigger
methods.description: Tells Infinite Scroll to load more content, regardless of the scroll position
methods.description_zh: 指示 Infinite Scroll 加载更多内容，而不管滚动位置如何

methods.name: reset
methods.description_zh: 将调用 index 重置为 0

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stops working, regardless of scroll position
methods.description_zh: 停止工作，无论滚动位置如何

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Starts working. Checks scroll position upon call and if trigger is hit, it loads more content
methods.description_zh: 开始工作。在调用时检查滚动位置，如果按下触发器，则加载更多内容

methods.name: updateScrollTarget
methods.description: Updates the scroll target; Useful when the parent elements change so that the scrolling target also changes
methods.description_zh: 更新滚动目标;当父元素发生更改时很有用，因此滚动目标也会发生更改

events.name: load
events.description: Emitted when Infinite Scroll needs to load more data
events.description_zh: 当 Infinite Scroll 需要加载更多数据时发出

offset.description: Offset (pixels) to bottom of Infinite Scroll container from which the component should start loading more content in advance
offset.description_zh: 到无限滚动容器底部的偏移量（像素），组件应提前从该容器开始加载更多内容

initial-index.description: Initialize the pagination index (used for the @load event)
initial-index.description_zh: 初始化分页索引（用于 @load 事件）

reverse.description: Scroll area should behave like a messenger - starting scrolled to bottom and loading when reaching the top
reverse.description_zh: 滚动区域的行为应该像信使一样 - 开始滚动到底部，并在到达顶部时加载

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Slot displaying something while loading content; Example: QSpinner
slots.description_zh: 加载内容时显示内容的槽;示例：QSpinner
